All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddItemButtonListener
Listener that adds new menu item or component item to database
App
This java file contains our database connection and the home page of our app.
CashierView
This class represents the user interface for the cashier role in the point of sale (POS) system.
CreateMenuButton
Class that creates menu item buttons to show on GUI
dbSetup
File that contains database information
ItemSelectionListener
Listener that updates the details in the side panel when an item in the table is selected
ManagerView
Class that creates and sets up the manager side of the POS system, and provides trends functionality
MenuItemDeleteListener
actionPerformed that will delete the selected item from the table.
PaymentBarGraph
A double bar graph used to represent the payment methods in the current day per hour.
ProductUsageChartPanel
This panel allows users to generate a Product Usage panel
ProductUsageData
Helper class to query and format product usage data
SaveMenuItemListener
Listener that saves any changes made to the selected item in the table.
TotalsBarGraph
A single bar graph used to represent the total sales in the current day per hour.
